page.title: 05Shirley Funnell French trip
page.content: On Thursday 28 March 1985,I got up at 7.00am.I was really excited because I was going to France for the day.I woke mum and dad,washed (very well) and got dressed.At 7.35am we set off for Portsmouth.When we arrived at Townsend Thoreson harbour there was a queue so dad dropped me and mum off just outside.After a lot of walking we got to the ship.It was called The Viking Venturer.On board the ship we went up to the Observer Room to choose a seat.When the ship had moved off I went and explored it.There were lots of things to see. I bought a pen. After the third hour Iwent on to the deck. It was very windy. Then suddenly we spotted France. When we got nearer I took some pictures. We arrived (at about 1.15pm) and went to look around the shops. I had a nice chocolate ice- cream.I was sad when we went home.
